1.title: Buy tickets
1.description: Select the raffle that you see is the best for you, the one where you see your lucky will be exploited, and then buy the number of spots that you want

2.title: Wait for the draw
2.description: When you have your tickets bought the only thing that you have to do is to wait for the draw. The raffle is going to be trigger if the date of the draw is reached or if the maximum number of allowed players go in it before that date.

3.title: Check for prizes
3.description: Once the round is over, come back to the page and check to see if youâ€™ve won!
